joke: The 2nd fastest thing is poop. What is even faster?
pun: Water splashing back up.

joke: Do you have a bathroom? No, it’s only for the employees.
pun: Well, I’d like to apply for a job.

joke: One added negative, about being blind...
pun: You never know when you're done wiping.

joke: If White Castle was a real castle…
pun: The moat would be made of diarrhea.

joke: Have you heard of the constipated mathematician?
pun: He worked it out with a pencil.

joke: What’s the true definition of bravery?
pun: Chancing a fart when you know you’ve had diarrhea.

joke: Support Bacteria!
pun: They’re the only culture some people have.

joke: What would you call a person who sends fart jokes by email all the time?
pun: A person who passed gas frequently.

joke: What do you get if you eat beans and onions?
pun: Tear gas.

joke: Why did the girl take toilet paper to the party?
pun: Because she was a party pooper!

joke: What's brown and sits on a piano bench?
pun: Beethoven's last movement.

joke: What do you call a person that doesn't fart in public?
pun: A private tutor.

joke: Why don't you fart in church?
pun: Because you have to sit in your pew.

joke: Did you hear about the constipated accountant?
pun: He couldn't budget.

joke: What did one toilet say to the other toilet?
pun: You look flushed.

joke: Did you hear about the constipated Wheel of Fortune player?
pun: He wanted to buy a vowel.

joke: Did you know that diarrhea is hereditary?
pun: It runs in your genes.

joke: I ate four cans of alphabet soup yesterday.
pun: Then I had probably the biggest vowel movement ever.

joke: Have you seen that new movie Constipated?
pun: It’s not come out yet.

joke: Laughter is the best medicine.
pun: Unless you have diarrhea…

joke: What’s big and brown and behind the wall?
pun: Humpty’s Dump.

joke: What did one fly say to the other?
pun: Is this stool taken?

joke: What do you get when you poop in your overalls?
pun: Dung-arees.

joke: You never really appreciate what you’ve got until it’s gone.
pun: Toilet paper is a good example.

joke: A man never really knows just how much he farts…
pun: Until he spends a day with a girl he really likes.

joke: I was going to tell you a poop joke
pun: but it’s really crappy.

joke: What do you call Clark Kent with diarrhea?
pun: Poop-erman.

joke: Do you want to hear a poop joke?
pun: Never mind it’s too corny.

joke: I woke myself up by farting last night.
pun: At least now the neighbors will never invite me round to see their holiday photos again.

joke: An old married couple are in church one Sunday when the woman turns to her husband and says, I’ve just let out a really long, silent fart. What should I do?
pun: The husband turned to her and said, Replace the battery in your hearing aid.

joke: I farted at work the other day and my workmate started trying to open the window.
pun: It must have been a really bad one – we work on a submarine.

joke: How many men does it take to change a roll of toilet paper?
pun: I don’t know; it has never been done!

joke: What did little William Shakespeare ponder when he was potty training?
pun: To poop or not to poop...that is the question.

joke: What do you get when the Queen farts?
pun: A noble gas.

joke: Why did the toilet paper roll down the hill?
pun: To get to the bottom.

joke: There are two reasons never to drink toilet water….
pun: Number one and number two!

joke: Did you hear about Robin Hood's toilet?
pun: He had a Little John!

joke: Melanie (age 5) asked her Granny how old she was. Granny replied she was so old she didn't remember any more. Melanie said,
pun: If you don't remember, just look in the back of your panties. Mine say five to six.

joke: How many people does it take to smell up the bathroom?
pun: Just a phew.

joke: When should you make vegetable soup in the toilet?
pun: When it has a leek in it.

joke: What happens if you accidentally fall into the potty?
pun: You stink or swim.

joke: Why do toilets run?
pun: They never learned how to jog.

joke: Did you hear about the girl who fell off the potty?
pun: She was so embarrassed, her cheeks flushed.

joke: Why did Tigger look in the toilet?
pun: He was looking for Pooh.

joke: Why do farts stink?
pun: So deaf people can enjoy them too.

joke: I rang the Incontinence Hotline yesterday
pun: The woman said, Can you hold, please.

joke: What’s the definition of a surprise?
pun: A fart with a lump in it.

joke: Did you hear about the movie Constipation?
pun: It never came out.

joke: What do you call a vegetarian with diarrhea?
pun: A salad shooter!

joke: How did Captain Hook hurt himself?
pun: He wiped with the wrong hand.

fact: Poop should sink. Floating stools are often an indication of high fat content, which can be a sign of malabsorption.
The smell of books makes some people need to poop. The Mariko Aoki phenomenon is the urge to defecate while visiting a bookstore.
Wombats have cube shaped poop which they use to remember where they live.
Pandas can poop up to 48 pounds per day
Some of the shooting stars we see are actually astronaut poop burning up in the atmosphere.
There are four bags of astronaut poop on the moon, left behind by Neil Armstrong on his Apollo mission.
Bird poop is white because birds can't pee. The paste is excreted through the bird's cloaca, a multi-purpose hole which means sewer in Latin.
The mega colon of the Balloon Man measured more than 7 feet long and 27 inches in circumference. Not surprisingly, severe constipation did him in.
The Parrot fish eats coral and poops sand, creating many of the small islands and beaches of the Caribbean.
During WWII, German tank drivers thought it was good luck to drive over camel dung. The British found out and made explosives that looked like poop.
Some caterpillars can fling their feces up to 3 feet to elude predators.
Piles of manure can be dangerous; microorganisms generate heat as they decompose manure and can spontaneously combust if hot enough.
85% of bathroom related injuries occur when someone falls into the toilet after the seat has been left up!
The average person visits the toilet 6-8 times each day or 2500 times per year. Therefore, in an average lifetime we spend 3 years on the toilet!
One out of ten people have pictures of loved ones in their bathrooms. In other words, 10 percent of people have their family watch them go.
Men spend an average of 2.4 minutes longer on the toilet than women do.
Water makes up about 75 percent of your bowel movements. The rest is an often-stinky combination of fiber, dead and live bacteria, other cells, and mucus.
The perfect stool is log-like and S-shaped, not broken up into pieces.
The average American man excretes 150 grams (about one-third of a pound) of stool every day, or the equivalent of 5 tons in a lifetime!
Digestion takes from 24 to 72 hours, as food travels down your esophagus to your stomach, then to your small and large intestine, and out the anus.
Diarrhea is the result of stool passing too quickly through the large intestine, where most of the water content is absorbed.
It’s normal to pass gas anywhere from 10 to 18 times a day
Women are more likely to discuss bathroom experiences with their friends than men.
The phrase short end of the stick, dates back to the Roman era. It refers to grabbing the wrong end of the stick with a sponge attached, which was used to wipe.
Sloths only poop once a week and it’s called the poo dance.
In the early 20th century, horse poop caused so much pollution that automobiles were seen as the “green” alternative.
All the poop generated on the US Navy’s newest Gerald R. Ford-class aircraft carrier will be vaporized by plasma.
Dubai has no sewer system. Instead they use poop trucks to haul the entire city's excrement away.
3 billion people around the world still rely on charcoal and dung to cook their food…
Salvador Dalí smeared himself with goat dung before meeting his wife for the first time
In India, a company makes paper products out of elephant dung.
The outer skin of a corn kernel is indigestible and seem to appear as whole kernels in our stool.
Rabbits can poop up to 500 pellets per day.
The average human poops 2 pounds a day. Elephants produce up to 80 pounds per day!
White stool can be caused by a lack of bile.
With the help of a high-fiber diet, the longest poop ever recorded was 26 feet.
Poop stinks because bacteria produce foul smelling compounds that are rich in sulfur and nitrogen
One third of human bowel movments are composed of dead bacteria.

Tió de Nadal is a mythical Christmas character made by decorating a short log. It is fed each day from December 8th until Christmas, at which time it is sung to and beaten with sticks until it poops out gifts
Eliminating your poop is vital to good health. Pooping more than once per day is ideal.
Unless you’ve eaten a bunch of tomatoes or other red food, red poop is something you should get advice from a doctor about. It can indicate that there is blood in your poop caused from disease.
Poop that is light in color could indicate an issue with your bile and seeking medical evaluation is necessary.
Yellow poop, especially if foul-smelling indicates malabsorption of fats in your diet. If it persistent, seek medical advice.
Green poop can mean your food is moving through your large intestine too rapidly. It could also mean you have eaten a lot of green leafy vegetables. Keep an eye on it.
Black poop could mean you are bleeding internally. It could also be a result of vitamin supplements such as iron. Black poop should be addressed with your physician.
Poop is naturally brown because of the bile produced in the liver. Brown is the color poop is supposed to be and is normal.
The word POOP comes from the Middle English word POUPEN, meaning to blow a horn or toot. (i.e., to fart)
Squatting over the toilet makes for a quicker, more effortless session than sitting.
If blue whales eat shrimps or prawns, their poo will be pink
Green Bay Wisconsin produces the most toilet paper in the world
The first toilet ever seen on TV in the USA was on Leave It To Beaver
40,000 Americans are injured by toilets every year
